title: Got Disconnected from a match and my internet is working fine
body: Thanks Riot for the new patch 1st ranked of the day i have time to play, i got randomly disconnected, and guess what an error doesnt let me reconnect thanks for the points drop im gonna have btw really appreciated.

replies.body: Sounds like your firewalls might be blocking your access when you tried to reconnect. [**Disable or update your firewalls**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) to test it really quickly, but let me know if it doesn't help so we can check a couple other things too.
